title: Mongodb health check fails on Quarkus 3.5.1
body:
### Describe the bug

When we upgraded Quarkus from 3.5.0 to 3.5.1 /q/health fails with
```
2023-11-09T13:36:51.833+0100  ERROR io.smallrye.health SRHCK01000: Error processing Health Checks: java.lang.IllegalStateException: The current thread cannot be blocked: vert.x-eventloop-thread-1

```

the behavior is not present in quarkus:dev

### Expected behavior

Health check does not fail because of IllegalStateException: The current thread cannot be blocked

### Actual behavior

Health check does fail because of IllegalStateException: The current thread cannot be blocked

### How to Reproduce?

Have not managed to create a reproducer. 
In the environment this is running the proxy in front of the application seems to connect with http2 and keeping the connection alive.

Current attempts produce the following stack: (forcing return `false` in `Infrastructure.canCallerThreadBeBlocked()`)
```
        2023-11-09 14:56:31,581 ERROR [io.sma.health] (executor-thread-1) SRHCK01000: Error processing Health Checks: java.lang.IllegalStateException: The current thread cannot be blocked: executor-thread-1
        at io.smallrye.mutiny.operators.uni.UniBlockingAwait.await(UniBlockingAwait.java:30)
        at io.smallrye.mutiny.groups.UniAwait.atMost(UniAwait.java:65)

        at io.quarkus.mongodb.health.MongoHealthCheck_ClientProxy.call(Unknown Source)
        at io.smallrye.context.impl.wrappers.SlowContextualSupplier.get(SlowContextualSupplier.java:21)

        at io.smallrye.mutiny.operators.AbstractUni.subscribe(AbstractUni.java:36)
        at io.smallrye.mutiny.operators.uni.UniRunSubscribeOn.lambda$subscribe$0(UniRunSubscribeOn.java:27)
        at io.smallrye.mutiny.vertx.MutinyHelper.lambda$blockingExecutor$6(MutinyHelper.java:62)
        at io.vertx.core.impl.ContextBase.lambda$executeBlocking$1(ContextBase.java:180)
        at io.vertx.core.impl.ContextInternal.dispatch(ContextInternal.java:277)
        at io.vertx.core.impl.ContextBase.lambda$internalExecuteBlocking$2(ContextBase.java:199)
        at io.quarkus.vertx.core.runtime.VertxCoreRecorder$14.runWith(VertxCoreRecorder.java:582)
        at org.jboss.threads.EnhancedQueueExecutor$Task.run(EnhancedQueueExecutor.java:2513)
        at org.jboss.threads.EnhancedQueueExecutor$ThreadBody.run(EnhancedQueueExecutor.java:1538)

        at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:1583)


```

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 21+35-2513)

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.5.1

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

mvn

### Additional information

_No response_
